Create polygon from bounding box

Source: R/read.R
bbox_ply.Rd

Utility function to create polygon from bounding box

bbox_ply(lon_min, lat_min, lon_max, lat_max)

Arguments

lon_min

longitude, minimum
lat_min

latitude, minimum
lon_max

longitude, maximum
lat_max

latitude, maximum

Value

Returns a spatial feature sf polygon.

Examples

# Florida Keys area
lon = -81.3; lat = 24.5; w = 10
bbox_ply(lon - w, lat - w, lon + w, lat + w)

#> Geometry set for 1 feature 
#> geometry type:  POLYGON
#> dimension:      XY
#> bbox:           xmin: -91.3 ymin: 14.5 xmax: -71.3 ymax: 34.5
#> CRS:            NA
#> POLYGON ((-91.3 14.5, -71.3 14.5, -71.3 34.5, -...
